item.title: ‘Avid Gamer’ Zayn Unveils New Song for ‘Borderlands 4’ Release (Exclusive)
item.description: Zayn is back with new music, and while it isn’t part of a new album this time around, the singer says his latest release is just as personal. The British singer-songwriter has teamed up with 2K
